characters.name: Fin

abilities.passive: Fin's heavy attacks deal 4 more damage.
abilities.quick_attack: Fin rolls towards a direction and becomes untargetable. (ResetTime: 2 sec)
abilities.spell: Fin enters counter stance, if hit deals 25 damage. (Cooldown: IfHit(15 seconds) NoHit(10 seconds) )

characters.lore: This character doesn't currently have a lore.

characters.name: Vander

abilities.quick_attack: Vander makes two swift hits with his katana each dealing 3 damage. The first also heals for 3 damage, while the second knocks the enemy back. (ResetTime : 2 seconds)
abilities.spell: Vander stabs forward with his long sword dealing 10 damage and healing for 5 health. (Cooldown : 12 seconds)

characters.lore: This character doesn't currently have a lore.

characters.name: Chiback

abilities.passive: When Chiback is hit 4 times, he becomes enraged and his next ability deals 150% damage.
abilities.quick_attack: Chiback creates fireblasts behind and in front of him that strongly knock back the enemy and disable his block for 1.1 second. (ResetTime : 3 seconds)
abilities.spell: Chiback takes a huge leap forward and hits the first enemy in his path. Depending on the distance covered before hitting the enemy, Chiback can deal 5, 10 or 15 damage. (Cooldown : 10 seconds)

characters.lore: Jebadaya Junior was a peaceful farmer growing his plants in his favourite family ranch. He lived there alone for many years, growing his plants and smoking pipe weed in a rate that would make Bilbo prowd. One god forsaken day, a specialist found out that there was a huge gold deposit below the surface of his farm's main field. Jebadaya was not interested in wealth and he sure wasn't gonna ruin his beautiful crops for some stupid glowing rocks. He actually started to believe that the unique efficiency of his pipe weed was partially deriving from the minerlas of gold that interracted with the plants. Hearing of this unclaimed treasure, many miners and fortune seekers tried to tresspass his land and dig for gold. With no weapon aside his farmers sythes he chased and fought every one of them until they started coming at him with much more violent intentions. Funny thing about gold, it is always valuable, so for the remainder of his life he was forced to fight off countless reckless and greedy foes who tried to uproot him. After a certain point he became so skillful with the sythes that only the bravest would still dare challenge his rage, and even them would never stand a chance.

characters.name: Steelager

abilities.passive: Steelager's bombs can hit him but cannot deal damage to him. Instead, they knock him towards the enemy.
abilities.quick_attack: Steelager throws bombs that explode after 1.15 seconds or if they collide with an enemy. Steelager can also detonate them manually by pressing the quick attack button again.(ResetTime : 2 seconds)
abilities.spell: Steelager's body explodes dealing 20 damage around him, and then reassembles.(Cooldown : 16 seconds)

characters.lore: This character doesn't currently have a lore.

characters.name: Lazy Bigus

abilities.passive: After Bigus has hit an enemy three times, his next heavy or charge attack poisons them.
abilities.quick_attack: Bigus fires a gunshot that deals 3 damage. (ResetTime : 2 seconds)
abilities.spell: Bigus fires a huge lazer charge that deals 10 damage and poisons the opponent (neglecting block) for 10 damage over 10 seconds. (Cooldown : 20 seconds)

characters.lore: This character doesn't currently have a lore.

characters.name: Skipler

abilities.passive: Every time Skipler hits an enemy with his quick attack, his Spell cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
abilities.quick_attack: Skipler leaps forward in the direction of movement and hits an enemy in front of him dealing 5 damage. (ResetTime : 3 seconds)
abilities.spell: Skipler swiftly dashes in the direction of movement, passing through units and dealing 10 damage. (Cooldown : 8 seconds)

characters.lore: Skipler was an unconventional scientist funding his extravagant work by using a complex computer he manufactured that made stock predictions (it could also override any gaming anti-cheat system, except for ours of course), until some government agents found him out and tried to force him to work for the state, using a list of federal crimes he commited in the name of science as leverage. When Skipler secretly disposed of them (they were found forging in a medow two years later),he put a target on his back and armies of policemen and federal agents went after him. Little did they know that Skipler had just found the way to traverse to alternate dimensions using a rear and powerful "Interdimentional Crystal" that he may or may not have stolen from an alien species. He build a mechanical arm that would contain and control the enormous power of the crystal, that was connected with his nervous system so he can bend it to his will.Thus, he disappeared along with all evidence of his work, and went on roaming across universes collecting data and experiences that intensifi.

characters.name: Rager

abilities.quick_attack: Rager has an infinite, almost instantly hitting attack that can be spammed and deals 5 damage. (ResetTime : 0 seconds)
abilities.spell: Rager grabs his opponent and performs a combo that ultimately deals 25 damage. (Cooldown : 20 seconds)

characters.lore: Few days after his town was wrecked by a nuclear plant explosion, Aye's mother gave birth to him and died at labour. He was severely deformed so the doctors thought he wouldn't survive long. They decided to keep and study him, and surprisingly after some time his health was completely stablized. When Aye started growing up and the doctors started finding out that one of the radiation's alternations to his DNA gave him enormous strength. They contacted the military which immediately contained him and turned him into a supersoldier. Impervious to bullets and with his hands strenth and swiftness he was unstoppable, the weapon that could not be countered. At last, an enemy military intelligence service decided that the best way to relieve themselves from Aye's threat was not to fight him. After some backround check they sent him an envelope that contained proof that the nuclear plant explosion that killed his family was an inside job by the current government to alleviate the past establishment. He fled the military and was not seen by anyone since. Every government member was strangled gruesomely under mysterious circumstances the folowing months. For years nobody knew his whereabouts until he became the worlds top noch bowler after Jesus Quintana.

characters.name: Lithra

abilities.passive: Lithra's attacks have a 25% chance to trigger a 0.8 second stun on the enemy.
abilities.quick_attack: Lithra leaps forward. If he hits an enemy, he deals 3 damage and stuns them for 0.5 seconds, and then leaps back. (ResetTime : 3 seconds)
abilities.spell: Lithra throws his rope tied bell towards the enemy dealing 10 damage. If the enemy is hit at max range, he is stunned for 1 second. (Cooldown : 10 seconds)

characters.lore: Lithra was a legend of the fighting pits, he never lost a duel. At a certain point he was banned from every fighting event(especially cockfighting which he misinterpreted), on account betting against him had no point anymore. Heartbroken, as destroying opponents was the only thing he lived for, he went on a two year bender and almost drowned himself in booze dozens of times. One night, two former rivals, who's careers ended when they faced him, spotted him hammered in a tavern and tried to take the opportunity to take revenge on him. They followed him to a belfry, where he sometimes climbed to gaze while drunk, and when they tried to corner him at the top, Lithra uprooted the bell and beat them to death and in a mad rage ran back to the tavern and went on a psychotic rampage, recking everything and everyone with his rope tied bell.

characters.name: Lupen

abilities.passive: Every 2nd time Lupen hits his passive, his quick attack's damage is amplified by 1.
abilities.quick_attack: Lupen slams forward with his whip dealing 1 damage and stealing speed from his enemy (enemy slow 1.5, Lupen speed up 1.5) (ResetTime : 2 seconds)
abilities.spell: Lupen takes the form of a random character . He is able to stay in the form until he uses the ability of the character. (Cooldown : 15 seconds)

characters.lore: Arpin was the undisputed greatest thief in the world. Swift as a cat, sharp as a fox, slick and sneaky but yet classy and always dressed to impress. There was no place he couldn't break into, and he always found his way out without no one even noticing what happened until it was too late. His heists where more of an art form than a crime (and some of them were really big crimes), and no bank or safe or secret was ever safe if his mind was set on aquiring it. One day he realized there was nothing worthwhile left to steal, and no worthy opponent to deny him. His eccentricity combined with his arrogance, led him to try and perform the ultimate last performance, for the looting of the prize he always yearned for. The ability to steal bodies! But only one being could posses a power like that. And that was Chan Chan! So after exhausting planning and preparing, he initiated the final heist, and managed to touch the orb that contained that power absorbing some of its essence before Chan Chan caught him. He found Arpin's struggle for stealing a microscopic insignificant fragment of his power funny, and he let him keep it just before he threw him in the D.I.E.N.A.M.O.

characters.name: Visvia

abilities.passive: Visvia leaves a trail of stink behind her that slowly deals 2 damage to enemies that enter it.
abilities.quick_attack: Visvia alternates between 3 stances. Each one of them has a different heavy attack and spell. (ResetTime : 0.5 seconds) . Stance 1: Normal Heavy attack , Stance 2: Fast attack that deals 5 damage and has extreme horizontal knockback , Stance 3: Grab the enemy pulling him towards Visvia and deal 3 damage
abilities.spell: Stance 1: Doubles fart damage and amplifies movement speed for 5 seconds. Stance 2: Stink desolves slower for 3 seconds . Stance 3: Explodes the trail of fart she left dealing 10 damage.  Cooldowns:(Stance 1: 10 seconds, Stance 2: 6 seconds , Stance 3: 8 seconds ).

At a certain point he was banned from every fighting event(especially cockfighting which he misinterpreted), on account betting against him had no point anymore.
